name: The messageType, type or element attributes are used to specify the type of a variable. Exactly one of these attributes MUST be used.
description: The messageType, type or element attributes are used to specify the type of a variable. Exactly one of these attributes MUST be used.
output:
Line and column for each violation 
Associated value => number of violations found
rationale: Compatible with CISQ 18 and especially ASCCSM-CWE-835
remediation: The messageType, type or element attributes are used to specify the type of a variable. Exactly one of these attributes MUST be used.
